name: Emergency
description: Treats acute and life-threatening illnesses and injuries.

name: Internal Medicine
description: Treats chronic conditions such as diabetes and heart disease.

name: Surgery
description: Performs surgical procedures to treat conditions or injuries.

name: Obstetrics and Gynecology
description: Provides care related to pregnancy, childbirth, and women's health.

name: Cardiology
description: Specializes in conditions of the heart and blood vessels.

name: Oncology
description: Treats cancer and tumors through therapies like chemotherapy.

name: Radiology
description: Uses medical imaging techniques to diagnose and treat diseases.

name: Neurology
description: Treats diseases and disorders of the brain and nervous system.
